name: Wilson's Lab
description:
Wilson's Laboratory is a 2D Puzzle Game in which the player must help Wilson to complete experiments by destroying pillar blocks under the frame test cube. To complete a level, the slime must go into the test tube.

You must destroy left or right pillar to tilt the level and steere the ball to reach the end of level

This game was made for the 49th ludum dare with the theme "Unstable".

Programmers : 

Paul LEDUC 

Sébastien GUAROBER 

Romain HABIB

Game Designer :

Soulaymane GUIGON
